representation_information.name: ISO/IEC 15444-1:2004. Information technology -- JPEG 2000 image coding system -- Part 1: Core coding system (formal name); JPEG 2000 core coding (common name)
representation_information.description: Compression encoding generally used for full color and grayscale continuous-tone pictorial images. Core coding uses a discrete wavelet transform and other compression elements in a variable manner, and the outcome may be lossy or lossless.

relation.title: Sustainability of Digital Formats: Planning for Library of Congress Collections
